Text: LAST CALL FOR FALLDear AMU Graduate Student We are looking forward to seeing you in classes in the Fall semester If youve already registered you may disregard this email and get back to having a terrific weekend If you have not registered for a course in the Fall semester please read the very important information below Theres still time to register If youve not had a chance to register in our Fall November semester please log on with your ID and password and do so now at campusdefaultasp As I am sure you know weve added tons of new courses and new programs so theres a course for every student at AMU in Fall If you have skipped a semester If your last course was taken in Fall of or prior and you are NOT on a Leave of Absence please note that you are in danger of disenrollment AMU Students are required to complete one course each year in order to remain active Those students who do not complete the required courses are disenrolled Disenrollment has no negative consequence academically It does mean however that you need to contact AMU to be readmitted when you return We will assign you a new Student ID and verify all your admission contact information Best Regards Kathie Ferrette Dean of Students AMU
